column2: "Na ahyɛmu a odzi kan no wɔ nyamesom ho ahyehyɛdze
column3: nye ne wiadze ha krɔnkrɔnbea."

column2: "Na wosii ntamadan bi
column3: dza odzi kan a wɔfrɛ no Krɔnkrɔnbea

column2: "Na ntwamutam a otsia ebien no ekyir na ntamadan a wɔfrɛ no Krɔnkrɔn mu Krɔnkrɔn no wɔ;"
"ɔwɔ sika eduhuamhyew mbukyia
column3: nye ahyɛmudaka no a wɔdze sika edura ho nyina a sika kutu a manna wɔ mu
column4: nye Aaron poma a ɔfefɛwee no
column5: nye ahyɛmu apon no wɔ mu no:"

column2: "na no do na enyimnyam kerubfo a wɔtserɛw mpatagua no do si; ndzɛmba yi yenntum nnka ho asɛm nkorkor sesei."
"Na woesiesie ndzɛmba yi dɛm no
column3: asɔfo no kɔ ntamadan a odzi kan no mu daa kɛyɛ ɔsom ho edwuma

column2: "na dza otsia ebien no dze
column3: sɔfopanyin no na afe du a
column5: onngya bɔgya a ɔdze bɔ afɔr wɔ nankasa nye ɔman no hɔn mfom ntsi:"

column2: "Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn dze yi kyerɛ dɛ
column3: ntamadan a odzi kan no da ho si hɔ yi
column4: wonnyae nnyii kwan a wɔdze kɔ krɔnkrɔnbea mu no edzi;"

column2: "na ɔyɛ nsɛntoho ma sesei ber a ɔwɔ hɔ yi; dɛ mbrɛ wɔdze ayɛyɛdze nye afɔrbɔdze a onntum mma nyia ɔsom no nndzi mu wɔ tsibowa afamu
column4: "osiandɛ ɔnye edziban nye anondze nye eguaree horow yɛ honam afamu ahyehyɛdze ara a wɔhyɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ nkodu mber a wɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ no."

column2: "Na Kraest dze
column3: ɔbaa dɛ ndzepa a aba dada no ho sɔfopanyin no
column4: ɔnam ntamadan a ɔso na odzi mu kyɛn a wɔammfa nsa ennsi no do
column5: ɔno nye dɛ ommfi abɔdze yi mu
column7: "na eso ɔnnam mpɔnkye nye anantwimba bɔgyaa mu
column8: mbom ɔnam nankasa no bɔgyaa do kɛhɛɛn krɔnkrɔnbea no mu prɛko kenyaa onnyiewiei ɔgye no."

column2: "Na sɛ mpɔnkye nye anantwinyin bɔgyaa nye anantwiber nso a wɔdze petse hɔn a hɔn ho egu fi do no tsew hɔn ho kɔ honam ahosan mu a
column4: "mpɛn ahen ara na Kraest a ɔnam onnyiewiei Sunsum no do dze noho bɔɔ afɔr a nkekaa nnyi ho maa Nyankopɔn no
column5: no bɔgyaa nnkɛtsew hom tsibowa ho efi ndwuma a nkwa nnyi mu ho akɔsom Nyankopɔn tseasefo no?"

column2: "Na iyi ntsi ɔyɛ ahyɛmu fofor no ho ntamugyinafo
column3: ama hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn no enya onnyiewiei egyapadze no ho anohoba no
column5: ɔdze gyee hɔn a wɔyɛɛ nkan ahyɛmu no ho mfomdo no."

column2: "Na mbrɛ samansew wɔ no otwar dɛ wɔkyerɛ nyia ɔhyɛe no no wu."
"Na sɛ owu ba a nna samansew wɔ ngyinado; na nyia ɔhyɛe no tse ase a
column3: ɔnnyɛ edwuma."

column2: "Ɔno ntsi na woennkwetsi bɔgya annhyɛ ahyɛmu a odzi kan no so."
"Na Moses kaa ahyɛdze no nyina kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyina
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse no
column4: ɔfaa anantwimba no nye mpɔnkye no bɔgyaa
column7: nye odwon hataw na ɔdze petsee nwoma no
column8: nankasa nye ɔman no nyina do

column2: "na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Iyi nye ahyɛmu a Nyankopɔn ahyɛ wɔ hom ho no no bɔgyaa."

column2: "Bio so
column3: ntamadan no nye asɔfodwuma no ho ndzɛmba nyina ɔdze bɔgya petsee ho dɛmara."

column2: "Nkyɛ mereyɛ maaka dɛ adze nyina
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse

column2: "Dɛm ntsi otwar dɛ sor ndzɛmba no n'esusudo no wɔdze yinom tsew ho; na sor ndzɛmba no nankasa dze
column3: wɔdze afɔr a oye kyɛn yinom tsew ho."

column2: "Na Kraest annhɛn krɔnkrɔnbea a wɔdze nsa yɛe a ɔyɛ nokwar dze no ho ntoho no mu; na mbom ɔhɛɛn ɔsor ankasa dɛ afei worikeyi no edzi wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim ama hɛn;"
"na eso nnyɛ dɛ ɔdze noho bɔbɔ afɔr mpɛn pii dɛ mbrɛ sɔfopanyin no dze bɔgya a ɔnnyɛ nankasa nedze hɛn krɔnkrɔnbea afrenhyia afrenhyia no;"
"ɔnodze na nkyɛ otwar dɛ ofi wiadze ahyɛse hu amandze mpɛn pii: na afei dze mbersantsen ruwie du yi
column3: woeyi no edzi prɛko dɛ ɔnam noho afɔrbɔ do beyi bɔn akɔ."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ wɔahyɛ ama nyimpa dɛ owu prɛko
column3: na ɔno ekyir atsɛmbu bɛba no
column5: "dɛmara na Kraest so a wɔdze no bɔɔ afɔr prɛko dɛ ɔnsoa nyimpa pii hɔn bɔn no
column6: obokwetsi bɔn eyi noho edzi ne mpɛn ebien akyerɛ hɔn a wɔtweɔn no no dze hɔn akɔ nkwagye mu."
